body:
STRIPACK: Delaunay Triangulation
This package is dynamically used by a Plug-In of VisIt, refer to:
https://visit-sphinx-github-user-manual.readthedocs.io/en/develop/gui_manual/WorkingWithFiles/Read_Write_Options.html#ffp
as an option.

Stripack algorithm was originally developed by Dr. Renka and published in the ACM Transactions on Mathematical Software, Vol. 23, No 3, September 1997, https://dl.acm.org/doi/10.1145/275323.275329
The original Fortran 77 package STRIPACK is available from netlib under ACM license as algorithm number 772 at
http://www.netlib.org/toms/772.gz
The Fortran 90 implementation by John Burkardt under LFPL is at
https://people.sc.fsu.edu/~jburkardt/f_src/stripack/stripack.html
This is the implementation we need since we want a double precision interface.
title: New Package: STRIPACK
